The bet came out of a question Piers Morgan asked Oprah: What advice would you give Michael Vick ? We thank our current directors for their outstanding service to HP and welcome the opportunity to work with our new members. HP's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc., disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google co-founder Larry Page ( Alert).
